column4: does anyone know how to get identified in xChat? Some channels on this network says I need to be it in order to join them.
could anyone recomand a file manager app like Norton Commander (win) for ubuntu
'mc' -> midnight commander.. Just get it.. :) theres also 'gentoo' and 'worker' and some others
jrib, savvas: thanks for the tips! Gonna try out gnome commander and mc!
